loot_or_craft_catalyst.title: Get a Catalyst
loot_or_craft_catalyst.description: Craft a Catalyst to use it to lit the Stone Bricks portal 2 by 3 like The Nether to open the gate towards The Undergarden.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Now use it to lit the portal!

travel_to_the_undergarden.title: Travel to The Undergarden
travel_to_the_undergarden.description: A 2 by 3 ring of Stone Bricks lit with the Catalyst. That`s all you need to lit and jump.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome to hell! Hard to roam around and constant fear of fire.

locate_catacombs.title: Find The Catacombs
locate_catacombs.description: The Catacombs are the perfect place to find rare ancient loot!

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing. Now let`s take care of the enemies. Search around for chests too!

80enemies_undergarden.title: Slay 80 Enemies in The Undergarden
80enemies_undergarden.description: This new place is much more harsh. New possibilities, new enemies. Get acquainted.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Remember that Forgotten Guardians are not as easy to slash.

locate_kinoras_garden.title: Find Kinora`s Garden
locate_kinoras_garden.description: Kinora`s Garden is the home of Kinora The Royal Mantyd. It should be a bricked base topped with cherry blossom trees.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great finding! Now it`s time to release the realm of her threat!

slay_kinora.title: Slay The Royal Mantyd
slay_kinora.description: She is a very tricky mantyd so make sure you can talk her down.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! The realm is vast and there are more threats around.

locate_deadly_crypt.title: Locate The Deadly Crypt
locate_deadly_crypt.description: The Deadly Crypt is very simmilar to a Jungle Temple, but it's just way bigger and more polished with Jade.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing spotting. Now take care down there as the crypt is filled with puzzles.

slay_ah_puch.title: Slay The Ah Puch
slay_ah_puch.description: Ah Puch is pure evil awakened. Mayan devil that caught form in this realm. Be careful when fighting him.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: I could not belive it even if predicted. Amazing Job! But threats still lay on these warm underlands.

65combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 65
65combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 65.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

get_tier_6_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 6
get_tier_6_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

locate_overgrown_temple.title: Locate The Overgrown Temple
locate_overgrown_temple.description: The Overgrown Temple is a goldy looking pyramid in the warm lands of The Undergarden that can be found towards the upper ceiling.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! You found it. Our next enemy is located inside, but the puzzles tricked many into losing their lives.

slay_kukulkan.title: Slay Kukulkan
slay_kukulkan.description: Kukulkan is an ancient mayan being landed on this realm to find peace and hunting ocasionally in The Overworld. It`s time to put an end to it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good Work! You now freed the realm of it`s threats.

70combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 70
70combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 70.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_unbergarden_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_unbergarden_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues. We need to now go higher than The Aether!
